title: BNY's Loh: Need To Get Used to Lower Yield Environment (Audio)
itunes:title: BNY's Loh: Need To Get Used to Lower Yield Environment (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: FED IN FOCUS: Marvin Loh, Senior Global Markets Strategist at BNY Mellon, on the bond markets, the Eurozone, and his outlook for investors.
